0.1.name: wordpress/woocommerce-google-adwords-conversion-tracking-tag
0.1.description: This plugin fills a small gap in the tracking of Google AdWords conversions in conjunction with WooCommerce. Whereas other available plugins inject a static AdWords tracking tag, this plugin is dynamic and enables the tracking code to also measure the total value of the transaction. This is important if you want to measure the ROI of the AdWords account. Sure this can be done in different ways, but for everyone who would like to use this feature with WooCommerce and AdWords, this is the right plugin. It has been tested with Wordpress 3.6, WooCommerce 2.0.13 and the WooCommerce theme Wootique 1.6.7, though the plugin should work with all WooCommerce themes.
